scripts.start: npm run docker:up && npm run install-deps && concurrently "node backend/server.js" "cd frontend && ng serve"
scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && npm run install-deps && concurrently "node backend/server.js" "cd frontend && ng serve"
scripts.dev:mongo: npm run install-deps && concurrently "node backend/server.js" "cd frontend && ng serve"
